alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Logan; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with strong gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, southeastern Cherry, eastern Hooker, southern Brown, northern Lincoln, northwestern Logan, McPherson, northwestern Blaine and Thomas Counties through 545 PM CDT/445 PM MDT/... At 456 PM CDT/356 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Brownlee to 9 miles east of Swan Lake. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thedford, Tryon, Halsey, Seneca, Purdum, Brownlee, Ringgold, Elsmere, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Raven, Hawley Flats, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Koshopah, Kelso, Shimmons Lake, Big Lamunyon Flats, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, East Cody Lake, Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River and Norway. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 187 and 232. Highway 92 between mile markers 194 and 221. Highway 97 between mile markers 21 and 64. Highway 83 between mile markers 122 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Logan; Thomas; Western Cherry
